name: Smooth Operator
description:
You work at a luxurious underground hotel. The guests are very picky about moving between floors, and it’s your job to make sure they make it to their destination before they get upset and complain to your manager!

What to do

Move between floors, picking up passengers and automatically dropping them off when you stop at their desired floor. Be careful how you prioritise passengers, though, because you can only carry six at a time, and they will complain to your manager if you take too long to service them!

The game is over when too many complaints have been logged against you.

Instructions on how to play Controls ControlDescriptionUp Arrow Move the elevator up Down Arrow Move the elevator down Left Arrow Invite a passenger onto the elevator
